entries.name: <=>(other)
entries.desc: Compare this specification against another object. Using #sort_obj is compatible with Gem::Specification and other Bundler or RubyGems objects. Otherwise, use the default Object comparison.

entries.name: __swap__(spec)
entries.desc: Because Rubyforge cannot be trusted to provide valid specifications once the remote gem is downloaded, the backend specification will be swapped out.

entries.name: fetch_platform()
entries.desc: Needed before installs, since the arch matters then and quick specs don't bother to include the arch in the platform string

entries.name: sort_obj()
entries.desc: Create a delegate used for sorting. This strategy is copied from RubyGems 2.23 and ensures that Bundler's specifications can be compared and sorted with RubyGems' own specifications.
